preference.name: SUBSCMPL_statuses_for_failed_item
preference.preference_description: Indicates the statuses of the compliance result for which item can be marked as "Failed" in "Substance Compliance Dashboard" view. Valid values are the internal values for the LOV "Scp0SubstanceComplianceStatus". Its out-of-the-box values are: * 0: PASS. * 1: FAIL. * 3: Unapproved FAIL. * 4: Approved PASS. * 6: Invalid. * 7: No Data. * 8: Supplier Pass. * 9: Supplier Fail. * 10: Supplier Unknown. * 11: Error Zero Mass Provided. * 13: Declarable. The default values are 1 (FAIL), 3 (Unapproved FAIL)and 13 (Declarable).
